column5: Whats driving company specific returns todayCY trading 25 after German chip maker Infineon announced it was acquiring the company Infineon will acquire Cypress for 2385 per share in cash corresponding to an enterprise value of EUR9B The companies said that expected economies of scale will create cost synergies of EUR180M per annum by 2022 Other companies that may see a slight boost from the news include XLNX MXIM STM
